entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
